title: Louis reads Apple fan reactions to video on soldered in SSDs, and himself!
description:
https://forums.macrumors.com/threads/louis-rossman-on-soldered-ssd.2398023/

If you believe I'm worth 3.5 million, you can also believe I'm 6 feet tall :) https://celebslifereel.com/louis-rossmann-net-worth-2019-revealed-with-proof-age-bio-height/
If you want people to see your point, don't be a dick! https://youtu.be/PRGszw0KubQ

My initial video on soldered in SSDs: feel free to point out any point where I make factually inaccurate claims: https://youtu.be/RYG4VMqatEY

Why do I only talk about Apple? Because I work on them for a living!  John Deere, wheelchari manufacturers, samsung, etc are regular discussions as well. https://youtu.be/EOCt5YnePTQ https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=l-8qqkCbo3U https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xaHEuz8Orwo https://youtu.be/7a6zTIrRrdc https://youtu.be/NzNDq3iCUP4

My self help scam: here's how to fix your own stuff. Have fun. https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLkVbIsAWN2lsHdY7ldAAgtJug50pRNQv0
https://repair.wiki/w/A1707_2016-2017_15%E2%80%9D_Touchbar_MacBook_Pro
https://repair.wiki/w/How_To_Fix_an_iPhone_13_That_Randomly_Restarts

I don't know how USB-C works - maybe you're right. Like most customers, I'm not very tech savvy - I *DO* know that the same dongle that didn't work with an A1706 Macbook worked fine with a Dell XPS 9530, and I don't feel like paying $70 at the time for a dongle.... https://youtu.be/NYVjIjBMx6o?t=733 and that's what most customers would observe as well. 

Error 53 isn't about security - that's why they got rid of it. https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT205628 Detailed explanation  at 6:52 here: https://youtu.be/MUifN6abtSI?t=411

Applecare is not always giving you a new device. You might receive a refurb. Refurbs can, at times, look like this https://youtu.be/AUaJ8pDlxi8?t=757

I am a soy, snake oil salesman! Yes, I suppose I have been, for fifteen years... this is all fake, right? :) https://www.google.com/search?channel=fs&client=ubuntu-sn&q=rossmann+group+repair#lrd=0x89c2599df1f192db:0x7c00ae6baafd593f,1,,,,


https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pWuz6xDOLR8
https://youtu.be/A002AesVaFk
https://youtu.be/NzNDq3iCUP4
https://youtu.be/EOCt5YnePTQ
https://youtu.be/AUaJ8pDlxi8
https://youtu.be/PRGszw0KubQ
https://youtu.be/hiT81o-afu4
https://youtu.be/oaBW9qlYcwc
https://youtu.be/MUifN6abtSI?t=390
https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT205628
https://youtu.be/NYVjIjBMx6o
https://youtu.be/UdlZ1HgFvxI
https://youtu.be/RYG4VMqatEY
https://repair.wiki/w/Visual_inspection
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLkVbIsAWN2lsHdY7ldAAgtJug50pRNQv0
https://www.ti.com/product/LP8550/part-details/LP8550TLX-A/NOPB
https://www.ebay.com/itm/225578181191

00:00 - My video
34:25 - A job ad for a UI/UX person
